messages.content: Hi there! How can I assist you today with your hair needs?
i need to book an appt
Of course! Could you please let me know your preferred date and time, as well as the service you're interested in?

Great choice! Could you let me know your preferred date and time for the balayage appointment? Also, do you have a specific stylist you’d like to book with, or are you open to any of our talented team members?
can u help with some inspoooo
Absolutely! Balayage is a beautiful choice. Are you looking for something more natural and sun-kissed, or bold and dramatic? I can suggest some popular options based on your preference.

Lovely choice! For a sun-kissed balayage, you might consider warm caramel or honey tones to add a natural glow. Soft, subtle highlights around the face can also enhance the effect. If you'd like, I can send you some inspiration images or help you book a consultation with Melissa to discuss your vision further!
I’ll gather some inspirational images of sun-kissed balayage for you. Could you please provide your email address or preferred method of receiving them?
Great! I’ll send some sun-kissed balayage inspiration to davidjrgodinez@gmail.com shortly. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, just let me know!
You're welcome! Keep an eye on your inbox for those images. If you need anything else or want to book that appointment, just let me know. Enjoy the inspiration!
